personalDetails.aboutMe: Frontend developer with a foundation in React and TypeScript, passionate about collaborating within diverse teams to achieve shared goals. Currently expanding my skill set with Python and Tailwind, I thrive on the challenge of continuous learning. With a down-to-earth and iterative approach to problem-solving, I'm committed to delivering practical solutions that make a difference.
personalDetails.other: Outside of work, I am passionate about my hobbies and often engage in multiple projects simultaneously. In spring and summer, I relish fishing on lakesides. As colder seasons set in, I indulge in playing board games; recently, I've been running a Dungeons & Dragons campaign with colleagues at Smart. Additionally, you can find me rock-climbing whenever I get the chance, and occasionally, I've been known to strum the guitar.
